wizard.name: MQX 3.7 Project
wizard.description: Create MCU project with MQX 3.7 support...

page.description: Select the board to be used for this project
page.title: Select Board

uiElement.defaultValue: Select the board in the list above.

page.description: Select additional MQX libraries to add to the project.
page.title: MQX options

page.description: Select empty application or basic application.
page.title: MQX project type

uiElement.title: Application type
uiElement.tooltip: Select the type of application to create

elementChoice.name: Empty application
elementChoice.tooltip: Create main task with hello world message

elementChoice.name: Basic application
elementChoice.tooltip: Create also additional code according to selected drivers, e.g. MFS initialization..

uiElement.title: Please enter the IP address and mask below.
Separate the numbers by commas, e.g. 255,255,0,0.

uiElement.contentHelp: Enter the IP Address. Separate the numbers by commas!
uiElement.title: IP Address
uiElement.tooltip: Enter the IP Address. Separate the numbers by commas!

uiElement.contentHelp: Enter the IP mask. Separate the numbers by commas!
uiElement.title: Mask
uiElement.tooltip: Enter the IP mask. Separate the numbers by commas!

uiElement.contentHelp: Enter the gateway address. Separate the numbers by commas!
uiElement.title: Gateway
uiElement.tooltip: Enter the gateway address. Separate the numbers by commas!

page.description: Select configuration options for USB Host
page.title: USB Host options

page.description: Select files to add to the project
page.title: Add additional files

page.description: Choose the connection to use for this project
page.title: Connections

elementChoice.contentHelp: Connect to Freescale USB TAP BDM.
elementChoice.name: Freescale USB-TAP BDM

elementChoice.contentHelp: Connect to Freescale Ethernet TAP BDM.
elementChoice.name: Freescale Ethernet-TAP BDM

elementChoice.name: P&&E Cyclone MAX TCP-IP

elementChoice.contentHelp: Connect to P&&E Cyclone Max through host Serial Port.

elementChoice.name: Open Source BDM

elementChoice.contentHelp: Connect to target using USBDM BDM.
elementChoice.name: USBDM open source BDM
